thread.title: Death-row drug quandary: makers resist supplying prisons
thread.title_full: Death-row drug quandary: makers resist supplying prisons - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Bob Egelko
title: Death-row drug quandary: makers resist supplying prisons
text:
Photo: Sue Ogrocki, Associated Press This Oct. 9, 2014 file photo shows the gurney in the the execution chamber at the Oklahoma State Penitentiary in McAlester, Okla.
This Oct. 9, 2014 file photo shows the gurney in the the execution...
California will soon allow physicians to prescribe life-ending medications to terminally ill, mentally competent patients who request them. At the same time, the state lacks drugs to put condemned prisoners to death, if the courts were to lift a nearly decade-old moratorium on executions in California. This Oct. 9, 2014 file photo shows the gurney in the the execution chamber at the Oklahoma State Penitentiary in McAlester, Okla.
